s.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> The battle was not wha=
t it seemed . . . 
> =A0
> The punch Rodimus had thrown, the one that was s=
o easily blocked by Tuscon, would have shocked Rodimus had it landed. He wo=
uld have been glad to be rid of this annoyance, yes, but it would have been=
 somewhat disappointing as well. 
> =A0
> So when Rodimus was spun around b=
y Tuscon, the Autobot may have missed the wicked smile on his face, When Tu=
scon tried to=A0ram Rodimus into a wall, he may not have noticed that the s=
ound of crunching metal was not=A0Rodimus' but the reinrorced wall shearing=
 and tearing under the force of the assault. It was not the sound of=A0Rodi=
mkus' defeat that resonated through the room, but it was something else!
> =
=A0
> Many of the same teachers that had instructed Tuscon had trained a yo=
ung Hot Rod as well -=A0=A0Jazz, Prowl, Brawn, Kup, even Optimus himself! A=
nd while Rodimus no longer clearly remembered all these ones and what they =
had meant to him, thier lessons were still ground into him, and his reflexe=
s that had been honed over the years of battle! 
> =A0
> Also, this was no =
young Hot Rod that stood there before them, but a figure shapped by the ene=
rgy of the matrix into a character of leadership, power and ability. He no =
longer had access to the knowledge and wisdom of the matrix, the energy hav=
ing been stripped from him. But that power that had been imparted was still=
 there, reconfigured by the power of the predacon shell program!=A0He was f=
aster, stronger and far more durable then Hot Rod ever was,=A0he was=A0DARK=
 RODIMUS!
> =A0
> So when Rodimus hit the wall it was not truely pain that =
he felt, but the elation that a true battle was in the making. He felt that=
 charge that all warriors felt when they faced a foe that had some metal! I=
t was an eagerness twisted by Predacon programming into something dark and =
loathsome. 
> =A0
> So when he stood and turned around it was not defeat in=
 his stance but derision, "So you fancy yourself to be a Prime do you, scra=
ppling?" Rodimus said=A0his tone still mocking as he raised his arm,=A0smil=
ing as his optics glowing with energy, "Well let's see what you got!" With =
a thought he fired a blast of plasma energy from his arm mounted cannon at =
this new incarnation of Tuscon, who for the moment appeared to be posturing=
 for Hydras!
> =A0
> OOC: Remember, the matrix that is housed within Rodimu=
s has no energy of its own, only the housing. It does not have the power to=
 reach out and transform anyone, although I do have some ideas. I am not su=
re if you want to redo your post, or let it go as it stands.

on
